String.string: Speak with {@LinkCreature:248#2011#Hasmina} at {@Rgn:48002$$Khanovar Citadel} about your mission.
Venture into {@Rgn:76001$$Kanstria} and find out what happened.
Go to {@Rgn:76001$$Kanstria} and show Magistrate {@LinkCreature:249#2002#Ceidos} {@LinkCreature:249#2006#Celtan}'s letter.
Speak with {@LinkCreature:249#2003#Hasmina} at {@Rgn:76001$$Kanstria} and discuss how to scout {@Rgn:49004$$Melgatol Portal}.
Meet {@LinkCreature:249#2005#Hasmina} at the hill overlooking the {@Rgn:49004$$Melgatol Portal}.
You've infiltrated the portal site. Speak with Hasmina.
Search the slain {@Rgn:76001$$Kanstrian} scouts at {@Rgn:49004$$Blightroar} and recover their {@rawitem:45274$$unit insignias}.
Tell {@LinkCreature:249#2010#Hasmina} that you've retrieved all {@rawitem:45274$$unit insignias}.
Deliver the insignias to Magistrate {@LinkCreature:249#2002#Ceidos} at {@Rgn:76001$$Kanstria}.
Tell {@LinkCreature:249#2006#Celtan} in {@Rgn:76001$$Kanstria} about the slain scouts.
